List.Name: ATK_SUB_CATEGORY
List.Description: These are categories used by SpEffects to filter when they are applied.

List.Name: ATKPARAM_ATKATTR_TYPE
List.Description: Determines the physical attack "element" of an attack.

List.Name: ATKPARAM_SPATTR_TYPE
List.Description: Determines the non-physical attack "element" of an attack.

List.Name: ATKPARAM_DMGTYPE_NEW
List.Description: These are categories used to determine the type of stagger the player or enemy takes. (AtkParam version)

List.Name: SPEFFECT_DMGTYPE_NEW
List.Description: These are categories used to determine the type of stagger the player or enemy takes. (SpEffect version)

List.Name: GOODS_USE_ANIM
List.Description: These are TAE motion types used to determine item use animations.

List.Description: These are TAE motion types used to determine weapon base animations.
